metadata.name: Love in 2022 #1/100
metadata.description: Love in times of war is a powerful and timeless concept. In the midst of violence and destruction, love can provide a source of comfort and hope. It can be found in the small moments shared between loved ones, in the courage of those who risk their lives to protect their families, and in the resilience of communities who come together to rebuild after tragedy. Love in times of war is a reminder that, even in the darkest of times, there is still something to be found in the power of human connection.
